title: I did not get my IP boost
body: I verified my email and was promised an IP boost, but I did not receive it. I even restarted my client and computer. :[

replies.body: It looks like the IP boost was added just earlier today! Sometimes they take a bit to be delivered, dang lazy delivery poros! Double check for me, and let me know if you still aren't seeing it!
I appreciate you checking up on it - but no, I still don't see it. I logged on just now and it is not there.  I verified my email @ 5:24 pm earlier today.

If you're still not seeing it, grab a quick screenshot like the one I posted so I can see for sure. It's showing up on the backend as active already, but I can definitely fix that as long as I can see it's not working!

http://i.imgur.com/2STmWS2.jpg

If you see in the screenshot I just took, there is no Ip bonus icon showing up.

You won't be able to see the bonus from the main client page, which is why you aren't seeing it yet. Make sure you're checking on your profile, which I included a little pic for reference.

https://i.gyazo.com/254d9025ffd80be63cde115cc6a540cf.png
I would really like my IP boost. I'm new and I can't afford any champions I want. And earning IP is taking a very long time for me.
Am I going to get my Ip Boost for verifying?
